languages.text: "Сложно спорить со словами столь же мудрыми, сколь и сладкими, шерин! Но порой личины к несчастливцам приростают намертво, хоть с кожей да мясом отдирай. Такой радости я точно не возжелаю. Больше — нет".

traits.locale_text: "Сложно спорить со словами столь же мудрыми, сколь и сладкими, шерин! Но порой личины к несчастливцам приростают намертво, хоть с кожей да мясом отдирай. Такой радости я точно не возжелаю. Больше — нет".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."
languages.original_text: "Сложно спорить со словами столь же мудрыми, сколь и сладкими, шерин! Но порой личины к несчастливцам приростают намертво, хоть с кожей да мясом отдирай. Такой радости я точно не возжелаю. Больше — нет".

traits.locale_text: "It is hard to argue against the words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear away the entire face. This is not something I want. I am done."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is hard to argue against the words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear away the entire face. This is not something I want. I am done."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如此明智、如此甜蜜的话语真是很难让人反驳，亲爱的！然而有时候，那些伪装会与可怜主人的皮肤融为一体，而摘下这些伪装的唯一方法，就是把它们连同皮肉一起撕下来。这不是我想要的东西，已经不再是了。”
languages.original_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: “如此明智、如此甜蜜的话语真是很难让人反驳，亲爱的！然而有时候，那些伪装会与可怜主人的皮肤融为一体，而摘下这些伪装的唯一方法，就是把它们连同皮肉一起撕下来。这不是我想要的东西，已经不再是了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."

languages.text: «¡Es difícil rebatir esas palabras tan sabias como dulces, shereen! Excepto porque, a veces, los disfraces se mezclan con la piel de sus desafortunados dueños, y la única forma de librarse de ellos es arrancándolos de la carne. No quiero hacerlo. Ya no».
languages.original_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: «¡Es difícil rebatir esas palabras tan sabias como dulces, shereen! Excepto porque, a veces, los disfraces se mezclan con la piel de sus desafortunados dueños, y la única forma de librarse de ellos es arrancándolos de la carne. No quiero hacerlo. Ya no».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「甘い言葉と同じくらい、賢明な言葉に反論するのは難しいのよ、シャリーン！だけど、時に欺瞞は不幸な持ち主の皮膚と溶け合ってしまう。それを外すには、肉から皮膚を引き裂くしかない。それはあたしが望むことではないの。これ以上はね」
languages.original_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「甘い言葉と同じくらい、賢明な言葉に反論するのは難しいのよ、シャリーン！だけど、時に欺瞞は不幸な持ち主の皮膚と溶け合ってしまう。それを外すには、肉から皮膚を引き裂くしかない。それはあたしが望むことではないの。これ以上はね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Was soll man gegen solch weise wie süße Worte sagen, Shereen? Nur manchmal verschmilzt die Verkleidung mit der Haut des unglückseligen Besitzers und lässt sich dann nur noch entfernen, indem man Haut von Fleisch reißt. Das möchte ich nicht. Nicht mehr."
languages.original_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Was soll man gegen solch weise wie süße Worte sagen, Shereen? Nur manchmal verschmilzt die Verkleidung mit der Haut des unglückseligen Besitzers und lässt sich dann nur noch entfernen, indem man Haut von Fleisch reißt. Das möchte ich nicht. Nicht mehr."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Il serait difficile de nier ces paroles aussi sages que flatteuses, shereen ! Cependant, quand on porte un masque depuis trop longtemps, il arrive qu'il ne soit plus possible de le retirer sans arracher la peau avec. Ce n'est pas ce que je désire. Plus maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: « Il serait difficile de nier ces paroles aussi sages que flatteuses, shereen ! Cependant, quand on porte un masque depuis trop longtemps, il arrive qu'il ne soit plus possible de le retirer sans arracher la peau avec. Ce n'est pas ce que je désire. Plus maintenant. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Bu kadar doğru, bu kadar tatlı sözlere karşı ne denir ki şirinim? Tabii bazen kıyafetler talihsiz sahiplerinin tenleriyle bütünleşmiş oluyor, çıkarmanın tek yolu da onları bedenlerinden sökmek oluyor. İstediğim bu değil ama. Artık değil."
languages.original_text: "It is hard to argue against words as wise as they are sweet, shereen! Except sometimes guises meld with the skin of their unfortunate owners, and the only way to take them off is to tear skin from flesh. That is not something I want. Not anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar doğru ve bu kadar tatlı sözlere karşı ne denir ki şirinim? Tabii bazen kıyafetler talihsiz sahiplerinin tenleriyle bütünleşmiş oluyor ve çıkarmanın tek yolu da onları bedenlerinden sökmek oluyor. İstediğim şey bu değil. Artık değil."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
